author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Assam Company India board to consider dividend
description: Assam Company India's board meeting will be held on May 27, 2016, to consider and approve the Audited Financial Results for the 15 (fifteen) months period ended March 31, 2016 and declaration of Dividend, if any. Further, as per provisions of Insider Trading Code of the Company, trading window will remain closed between May 25, 2016 to May 31, 2016
articleBody: Assam Company India Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on May 27, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the Audited Financial Results for the 15 (fifteen) months period ended March 31, 2016 and declaration of Dividend, if any.Further, as per provisions of Insider Trading Code of the Company, trading window will remain closed between May 25, 2016 to May 31, 2016 (both days inclusive).Source : BSE Read all announcements in Assam Company

headline: Assam Company India's board meeting on February 12, 2016
description: Assam Company India Ltd has informed BSE that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company would be held on February 12, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results together with the Limited Review Report for the fourth quarter ended on December 31, 2015.
articleBody: Assam Company India Ltd has informed BSE that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company would be held on February 12, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results together with the Limited Review Report for the fourth quarter ended on December 31, 2015.Further, as per provisions of Insider Trading Code of the Company, trading window will remain closed between February 10, 2016 to February 14, 2016 (both days inclusive).Source : BSE Read all announcements in Assam Company

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Assam Company: Outcome of board meeting
description: Assam Company India in its meeting held on February 27, 2015, has approved the in terms of the provisions of the Companies Act, 2013,
articleBody: Assam Company India Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on February 27, 2015, inter alia, has approved the following1. In terms of the provisions of the Companies Act, 2013, &quot;Financial Year&quot; means the period ending on 31st March every year. In order to align the Financial Year as per the provisions of the new Act, the Company is extending its Financial Year by 3 (three) months, i.e., ending on 31st March, 2016.2. Resignation of Mr. Amit Kumar Ghosh, a Non-Executive, Independent Director, from the Board of Directors of the Company with effect from the close of business hours of 26th February, 2015.3. No Dividend will be declared on Equity Shares in the forth coming Annual General Meeting of the Company, in respect of the Financial Year ended on December 31, 2014.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Assam Company

headline: Assam Company: Updates on outcome of board meeting
description: Assam Company India in its meeting held on November 14, 2014, decided to circulate for consideration and approval of the members of the Company, the following Resolutions under Section 186
articleBody: Assam Company India Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on November 14, 2014, decided to circulate for consideration and approval of the members of the Company, the following Resolutions under Section 186 &quot;Loans and Investment by Company&quot; and Section 197 &quot;Overall maximum Managerial Remuneration and Managerial Remuneration in case of absence or inadequacy of Profit&quot; through electronic mode, as required under the provisions of Section 108 of the Companies Act, 2013, read with Rule 20 of the Companies (Management and Administration) Rules, 2014.The cutoff date for the purpose of e-voting is November 14, 2014.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Assam Company
